mainText:
My 1st computer was a Apple IIGS  it was the best at the time, the loss of
Mr. Jobs is truly a sad day for the everyone in the world, whether people
know it or not he revolutionized the world; with is ideas and innovations
and took it out of the dark ages.  No one else could have ever  done that I
just wish that I would have got a chance to experience one day in the
presents of this great mind, to everyone at apple that met and worked with
Steve jobs you are the blessed one's that got to meet a great inspiration
and thinker.   My condolences to his family and loved one's.
author: Eli
